member.name: T:GraphQL.GraphQLQuery
member.summary:
Value object representing a GraphQL query string and storing the corresponding APQ hash.
Use this to hold query strings you want to use more than once.

member.name: P:GraphQL.GraphQLQuery.Text
member.summary: The actual query string

member.name: P:GraphQL.GraphQLQuery.Sha256Hash
member.summary: The SHA256 hash used for the automatic persisted queries feature (APQ)
